repo_notes.content: This repository contains curated documentation from NixOS Wiki and Arch Wiki for debugging Linux graphics, gaming, and browser issues.
Arch instructions and troubleshooting steps are applicable to NixOS, only the way system is configured differs.
Repository main paths: arch/graphics, arch/gaming, arch/browsers, nixos/graphics, nixos/gaming, nixos/browsers
This repository is specifically designed to be used as context by AI agents when troubleshooting graphics, display, and performance problems.
For NixOS users, Arch documentation provides valuable troubleshooting concepts that can be adapted using NixOS-specific package management and configuration methods.
Key areas covered: Graphics Drivers (AMD, NVIDIA, Intel), Display Systems (Xorg, multi-monitor), Gaming (Wine, Steam, emulators), Browsers (hardware acceleration, configurations).
